headline: Eversource Energy Schedules Webcast to Discuss Fourth Quarter Results
summary: HARTFORD, Conn. and BOSTON, Jan. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Eversource Energy will webcast a conference call with financial analysts on Wednesday, February 12, 2025, beginning at 9 a.m. Eastern Time, at which senior management will review the company’s financial performance through 2024. This listen-only, live audio presentation will be accessible from the Investors section of the Eversource website.
